quests.desc: I hope you're ready to go into rooms and interact with objects, because you've just entered TextWorld! Here is how to play! First off, make it so that the non-euclidean locker within the pantry is unlocked with the non-euclidean latchkey. And then, ensure that the non-euclidean locker is open. Then, take the formless key from the non-euclidean locker inside the pantry. After that, insert the formless key into the formless safe inside the pantry's lock to unlock it. And then, ensure that the formless safe within the pantry is open. After opening the formless safe, retrieve the passkey from the formless safe in the pantry. And then, look and see that the box within the pantry is unlocked. Then, doublecheck that the box is ajar. After that, pick up the keycard from the box inside the pantry. With the keycard, unlock the safe inside the pantry. That's it!
commands: unlock non-euclidean locker with non-euclidean latchkey
take formless key from non-euclidean locker
unlock formless safe with formless key
unlock non-euclidean locker with non-euclidean latchkey
take formless key from non-euclidean locker
unlock formless safe with formless key

infos.name: recreation zone
infos.desc:
You've entered a recreation zone. You can barely contain your excitement.



 There is [if d_11 is open]an open[otherwise]a closed[end if] hatch leading east. There is [if d_10 is open]an open[otherwise]a closed[end if] cedar hatch leading west.

infos.name: playroom
infos.desc:
You are in a playroom. A typical kind of place. Okay, just remember what you're here to do, and everything will go great.



 There is [if d_0 is open]an open[otherwise]a closed[end if] gate leading west. You don't like doors? Why not try going north, that entranceway is unblocked.

infos.desc:

 You lean against the wall, inadvertently pressing a secret button.  There is [if d_4 is open]an open[otherwise]a closed[end if] gateway leading east. There is [if d_5 is open]an open[otherwise]a closed[end if] door leading west. You don't like doors? Why not try going north, that entranceway is unguarded.

 You see a counter. The counter is normal.[if there is something on the s_0] On the counter you can see [a list of things on the s_0]. Classic TextWorld.[end if][if there is nothing on the s_0] The counter appears to be empty.[end if]

 There is [if d_6 is open]an open[otherwise]a closed[end if] portal leading south. There is [if d_5 is open]an open[otherwise]a closed[end if] door leading east. There is an exit to the north. Don't worry, it is unblocked.

infos.desc:

You don't like doors? Why not try going south, that entranceway is unblocked. You don't like doors? Why not try going west, that entranceway is unguarded.

I just think it's awesome that you're in a studio now.

 You bend down to tie your shoe. When you stand up, you notice a locker. There's something about an object in a room that's just so... TextWorld.[if c_6 is open and there is something in the c_6] The locker contains [a list of things in the c_6].[end if][if c_6 is open and the c_6 contains nothing] What a letdown! You need an unblocked exit? You should try going east. There is an unguarded exit to the south.

Ah, the office. This is some kind of office, really great typical vibes in this place, a wonderful typical atmosphere. And now, well, you're in it.

 You can make out a non-euclidean box.[if c_7 is open and there is something in the c_7] The non-euclidean box contains [a list of things in the c_7].[end if][if c_7 is open and the c_7 contains nothing] The non-euclidean box is empty, what a horrible day![end if] If you haven't noticed it already, there seems to be something there by the wall, it's a mantle. What a coincidence, weren't you just thinking about a mantle? [if there is something on the s_1]You see [a list of things on the s_1] on the mantle. It doesn't get more TextWorld than this![end if][if there is nothing on the s_1]But there isn't a thing on it. Aw, and here you were, all excited for there to be things on it![end if]

walkthrough: unlock non-euclidean locker with non-euclidean latchkey
take formless key from non-euclidean locker
unlock formless safe with formless key

objective: Who's got a virtual machine and is about to play through an profound round of TextWorld? You do! Here is your task for today. First thing I need you to do is to insert the non-euclidean latchkey into the non-euclidean locker's lock to unlock it. After that, open the non-euclidean locker within the pantry. After that, recover the formless key from the non-euclidean locker. And then, doublecheck that the formless safe is unlocked with the formless key. Then, doublecheck that the formless safe in the pantry is opened. After that, pick up the passkey from the formless safe. If you can get your hands on the passkey, doublecheck that the box inside the pantry is unlocked. And then, open the box. And then, recover the keycard from the box. With the keycard, assure that the safe is unlocked. And once you've done that, you win!
